title: CANNOT USE PREPAID CARDS IN RUSSIAN SERVER
body:
i Live in London and play on EUW, i have Russian friends so i sometimes play on the Russian servers. I bought a Â£9 RP card from HMV however when i go onto the store on the Russian server there is no option to use prepaid cards, there are only 4 options of payment rather than the 6 or so on other servers, 
why is this?

replies.body: We'd like to look into this with you individually and find some options.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
